verbs.description: [ARG0: red cross] [V: offering] [ARG1: 2 000] [ARG2: to harvey victims] the red cross is offering financial assistance of up to 2 000 for people who lost their homes to harvey or suffered major damage most of those victims have likely already been processed through fema red cross american red cross international red cross and red crescent movement henry van de putte harvey red cross texas gulf
